table.0: Battle rage makes friend and foe indistinguishable. Foe is hit for +1d12 damage, and the ally nearest him is also hit by a rebounding blow for 1d4 damage.
table.1: Savage attack! Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike.
table.2: Attack sweeps foe off his feet. Next round, the enemy is prone.
table.3: Foe steps into attack. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike.
table.4: Powerful strike hammers foe to his knees. Make another attack.
table.5: Smash foe’s nose in an explosion of blood. Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike, and the foe loses his sense of smell for 1d4 hours.
table.6: Brutal strike to torso. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers multiple broken ribs.
table.7: Strike to hand knocks weapon into the air. The weapon lands 1d20+5’ away.
table.8: Blow caroms off skull, deafening foe for 1d6 days. Inflict +1d6 damage with this strike.
table.9: Strike to leg splinters femur. Inflict +2d6 damage with this strike and foe loses 10’ of movement until healed.
table.10: Sunder foe’s weapon! Shards of metal fill the air.
table.11: Strike hammers foe’s belly causing massive internal bleeding. Unless he receives magical healing, the foe dies in 1d5 hours.
table.12: Blow to cranium staggers foe. The foe must make a Fort save (10 + PC level) or sink to floor, unconscious.
table.13: Strike breaks foe’s jaw. Blood and shattered teeth ooze down the foe’s face. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike.
table.14: Attack hammers foe’s torso. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike.
table.15: Strike dislocates shoulder! Inflict +1d8 damage and shield arm hangs loosely by muscle and skin; no AC bonus from shield.
table.16: Attack reduces foe’s attack hand to formless tissue; -4 penalty to future attacks.
table.17: Furious blows hammer target prone. Make another attack.
table.18: Blow hammers shards of bone into foe’s forebrain; gray matter oozes out. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike, and the foe suffers 1d4 points of Int and Per loss.
table.19: Devastating strike to the chest. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike.
table.20: Chest strike stuns foe for 1d3 rounds. Inflict +1d8 damage with this strike.
table.21: Strike to leg shatters femur, knocking foe to the ground. Foe’s movement drops by half. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike and make another attack.
table.22: Weapon arm sundered by strike. The weapon is lost along with any chance of making an attack with this arm.
table.23: Blow craters skull. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike, and the target permanently loses 1d4 Int and Per.
table.24: Masterful strike to throat. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike and the foe staggers about gasping for air for 1d4 rounds.
table.25: Attack punches shattered ribs through lungs. Foe loses 50% of his remaining hit points and vomits copious amounts of blood.
table.26: Attack shatters foe’s face, destroying both eyes. Inflict +2d8 damage with this strike, and the foe is permanently blinded.
table.27: Crushing blow hammers chest. Inflict +3d8 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or be knocked unconscious.
table.28+: Blow destroys spinal column. Inflict +3d8 damage with this strike, and the foe must make a Fort save (DC 15 + PC level) or suffer paralysis.
